description: Homemade pizza dough is easy and costs pennies on the dollar compared to store bought. Make a batch now and freeze it for later!
keywords: Easy Pizza Dough, Homemade Pizza, pizza crust
name: Homemade Pizza Dough

recipeInstructions.text: Dissolve the yeast and sugar in the warm water. Allow the yeast water to sit for about 5 minutes, or until a thick layer of foam develops on top.
While youâ€™re waiting for the yeast, add 1 cup of the flour and the salt to a large bowl, then stir well to combine.

Add the olive oil to the yeast water, then pour the mixture into the bowl with the flour and salt. Begin adding more flour to the bowl, 1/4 to 1/2 cup at a time, until it forms a ball of dough that can no longer be stirred with a spoon.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured work surface, then knead for about 5 minutes, adding a little flour as you go to keep it from sticking.
At this point you have three options: use the dough tonight (one hour after kneading), use it tomorrow (allowing it to rise in the refrigerator over night) or within a month (freezing the dough).
